member.name: P:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.EnemyTurretHeadControllerPairs
member.summary: This is for all enemy turret pairs.

member.name: P:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.DeadBodyTurretHeadControllerPairs

member.name: P:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.ToilHeadData
member.summary: Toil-Head data.

member.name: P:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.ForceToilHeadSpawns
member.summary: If enabled, will force any spawned Coil-Heads to become Toil-Heads. This will get reset automatically when the day ends.

member.name: P:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.ForceToilHeadMaxSpawnCount
member.summary: If set to any value above -1, will temporarily override the Toil-Head max spawn count. This will get reset automatically when the day ends.

member.name: M:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.SetToilHeadOnServer(EnemyAI)
member.summary: This must only be called on the Host/Server. Only accepts an EnemyAI instance where the EnemyType.enemyName is "Spring".

member.name: P:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.MantiToilData
member.summary: Manti-Toil data.

member.name: P:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.ForceMantiToilSpawns
member.summary: If enabled, will force any spawned Manticoils to become Manti-Toils. This will get reset automatically when the day ends.

member.name: P:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.ForceMantiToilMaxSpawnCount
member.summary: If set to any value above -1, will temporarily override the Manti-Toil max spawn count. This will get reset automatically when the day ends.

member.name: M:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.SetMantiToilOnServer(EnemyAI)
member.summary: This must only be called on the Host/Server. Only accepts an EnemyAI instance where the EnemyType.enemyName is "Manticoil".

member.summary: If set to any value above -1, will temporarily override the Toil-Slayer max spawn count. This will get reset automatically when the day ends.

member.summary: Toil-Player data.

member.name: P:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.ForceToilPlayerSpawns
member.summary: If enabled, will force all Players to become Toil-Players when the round starts. This will get reset automatically when the day ends.

member.name: P:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.ForceToilPlayerMaxSpawnCount
member.summary: If set to any value above -1, will temporarily override the Toil-Player max spawn count. This will get reset automatically when the day ends.

member.name: M:com.github.zehsteam.ToilHead.Api.SetToilPlayerOnServer(GameNetcodeStuff.PlayerControllerB,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This must only be called on the Host/Server.
